org.apache.polygene.api.configuration

Interface ConfigurationComposite

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Composite, HasIdentity
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CassandraEntityStoreConfiguration, DebugServiceConfiguration, EhCacheConfiguration, ElasticSearchClusterConfiguration, ElasticSearchConfiguration, FileEntityStoreConfiguration, GeodeConfiguration, HazelcastConfiguration, HttpRepositoryConfiguration, JCloudsMapEntityStoreConfiguration, JdbmConfiguration, JettyConfiguration, JMXConnectorConfiguration, LevelDBEntityStoreConfiguration, LiquibaseConfiguration, MigrationConfiguration, MongoEntityStoreConfiguration, NativeConfiguration, PasswordRealmConfiguration, RedisEntityStoreConfiguration, ReindexerConfiguration, RiakEntityStoreConfiguration, SecureJettyConfiguration, ShiroIniConfiguration, SQLConfiguration, TraceServiceConfiguration

    @Queryable(value=false)
public interface ConfigurationComposite
extends HasIdentity, Composite
    Services that want to be configurable should have a ConfigurationComposite that contains all the settings. They are treated as EntityComposites, and are therefore stored in an EntityStore. There will be one instance per service instance that uses each ConfigurationComposite, and the reference of the entity is the same as that of the service.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.polygene.api.identity.HasIdentity

      • Fields inherited from interface org.apache.polygene.api.identity.HasIdentity

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.polygene.api.identity.HasIdentity
